It had converted all around me to its falsified fate and I watched in horror as both peasants and crusaders of the Light bowed in unison to this creature of debased prophecies. I retreated from its deformed presence, and now I must warn those that are still pure of its corrupting nature.

The worst thing has come to reality. The creature proved too strong, and now all have come to worship it as a demigod. I have been excommunicated from what was once a faith that fought the darkness but now is a cult praising a thing that mockingly resembles an angel. Even in the face of defeat, I will not stop my hunt. This thing must die, or mankind will be damned for eternity.

That useless cockroach Ascot is coming along. He is only dead weight to me. He will be good fodder at the very least.

We got the girl, but at heavy cost. The damn guards used some foreign fighting technique, nothing I’ve ever seen before. Caught us off guard but we outnumbered them. Ascot died in the ambush, only good thing to come of this. The damn wench doesn’t even speak sense, talking in some foreign tongue. Had to slap some quiet into her. This one better be worth whatever Mother is getting. This is more work than I prefer in a single day, and it is putting me in a worse mood.

We brought her back to Mother, and she sent us to meet up with the lot that asked for this foreign sheep in the first place. A bunch of nobles they are. The head of them has an “acquired” taste for imported goods and is offering us bountiful amounts of food, weapons, armor, whatever we want, for this fragile thing. I will be there to oversee the trade.

That contemptible whorish excuse for human cattle. That slit-eyed profligate grabbed hold of my damned hood. I knocked her right off her feet like the harlot she is and she hit her pretty little head on a table. Now her blood is on my hands and Mother wants revenge. I ran as fast as I could out of there. I am not dying for some debauched little waif.

It has been weeks, maybe even months. I lost track ever since the first hunting parties found me. That crazed hag never forgets a grudge. “A life for a life.” Nothing but deranged drivel from that witch. I never believed in her preachings, I was just in it for my own gain. Now she’s sending more and more thugs to take my head. I am better than all of them. I’ve racked up a kill count that should be feared, and it only grows with each perilous encounter.

This is tiring. That psychotic harpy continues to send more and more of her kin to hunt me down. I cannot live like this, in constant peril of the next ambush. It is time that I find a place to hide. Maybe life as a mercenary for a noble family will suffice. Best that those pompous fools die instead me when the time comes, after all...

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) They slaughtered all the men. My husband, my brother, even my own son. They have us all tied up, ready for whatever cruel fate they wish to inflict on us. They are slavers. I have heard of what happened to the neighboring clans, and we have become their next victims. I pray that we will be rescued soon, I cannot imagine what will become of me in this hellish place.

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) They treat us worse than cattle. We are given dirt to eat and left soiled. The women that have not been sold off are here with me, rotting away and wishing for death. The birds surround us, eager to feast on our broken bodies, but I feel a connection. They ask for a sacrifice in exchange for freedom. They want to know that I am willing to give. The others yell and kick them away, but I allow them to approach me. They ask for my arm’s flesh, and in exchange they will loosen my bonds. I accept.

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) Released of my bonds, I did not free the others. They refused the gifts of the flock and do not deserve the blessings I was bestowed. I carved a path of bodies as I made my way to the leader of this slavers’ group, the first of many offerings I will make to my new found family. When I finally found their leader, I did not hesitate to gouge his eyes out and leave him as one final offering for the first feast of my flock.

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) As for those left, I gave them a simple choice. Stay and become part of our flock, or deny us and become our offering. Many refused, and were made examples of. For those who stayed, I made it clear what we stood for. The cycle of life and death is all that matters. A life for a life is the cost for transgression. Every death is an offering, and so long as that one rule is kept, I will respect their way of life. We are shepherds for the weak, and those deemed unworthy will become an offering to our flock.
Uma coisa bela, é o que dizem. Perfeita como o mar de dunas. Graciosa como o vento do deserto. Cativante como uma miragem cintilante. Eles me observam, contemplam, assistem sem piscar.

Uma beleza singular como essa deve ser admirada, é o que dizem. Então me fazem dançar diante de seus rostos desesperados e empoeirados, de seus olhos úmidos e vermelhos, seus lábios rachados e sorridentes. Não sou uma pessoa para esses espectadores depravados, mas uma maravilha exótica. Sou uma coisa bela.

Essa beleza pertence ao palácio, é o que dizem. Então minhas mãos são atadas e sou colocada em uma caravana ao lado de ídolos dourados e ícones encrustados com joias. Juntos, somos uma carga de raridades fascinantes de valor inestimável, destinada a fazer parte do tesouro do vizir. Conheço a reputação desse tirano, e tenho medo.

Enquanto a carroça se arrasta pela estrada da montanha, faço uma escolha. Não irei para as mãos do vizir. Não serei o prêmio de um homem, seu joguete. Com minha destreza treinada, me livro de minhas correntes e salto para o ar livre. A carroça balança e o guarda grita. Rodas se levantam, cavalos entram em pânico...

Estou cercada por uma mistura de corpos e destroços. Meu braço está preso. A serpente surge silenciosamente detrás de uma pedra, sua língua provando o ar. A mordida é rápida, mas o veneno é lento. Ele corre frio por minhas veias, formigando ao subir pelo meu braço - me forçando a fazer uma escolha terrível.

A faca é cega e tenho que trabalhar rápido. Em pânico, serro, corto e arranco. Meus gritos são respondidos com a indiferença silenciosa das dunas, do vento frio do deserto, da luz fria da lua. Estou sacrificando minha beleza para ter uma chance de viver, pagando por meu futuro com a única moeda que possuo.

Contemplo a minha mão decepada, meu braço sangrando. Não haverá mais público lascivo, moedas lançadas aos meus pés. Expiro um agradecimento sem palavras para a minha libertadora, enquanto ela serpenteia de volta às sombras. Pelo menos estou livre da minha jaula dourada. Finalmente entendo: uma coisa não pode ser verdadeiramente bela até que esteja quebrada.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Já faz algum tempo desde que pisei na grande cidade. Muita coisa mudou na minha ausência. Eles também falam de um valente campeão que estará lutando na arena ao final do dia. Tentei entender a conversa, mas enquanto andava por aí, tudo o que ouvia era sobre os feitos heróicos desse homem. Como atingiu meu interesse, irei a caminho do anel de gladiadores em breve.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Típico. Tomei o caminho errado para a arena e acabei em uma parte muito esquisita da cidade, que servia de lar a muitas pessoas vulgares e sem escrúpulos. Era previsível que logo seria abordada por esse grupo de bandidos que tentariam desviar-me de meu destino. Uma escolha bem fraca de palavras e mãos que tocaram lugares que não deveriam, resultando em uma série desagradável de eventos que levou mais tempo do que eu esperava. O herói louvado começaria sua luta em breve, então peguei rapidamente meu espelho e me dirigi ao coliseu.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Quase não chego a tempo para a batalha. Por sorte, um dos guardas foi gentil o suficiente para me arrumar um assento onde eu poderia ver melhor a escaramuça. medida que os portes abriam, um único homem emergiu e sentei-me entre a multidão com admiração.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) O público aplaudiu de excitação. O guerreiro era a encarnação física da perfeição. Seu corpo cinzelado contou um homem que tinha visto batalhas rigorosas, enquanto seus longos cabelos flutuavam muitos acreditavam que ele nascera dos deuses. Em uma mão, ele segurava uma rede de pescadores e, na outra, um tridente ornamentado. Era tão perfeito que eu tinha motivos para acreditar que ele tinha alcançado sua beleza através de meios obscuros, exatamente como eu fiz.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Entre admiração e aplausos da multidão, o adversário do herói apareceu. No lado oposto da arena, um portão enferrujado se abriu e o que surgiu era um mosntro, um gigante puxado por correntes pelos carcereiros. Era uma criatura dos contos infantis. Um monstro grotesco coberto por espinhos de ferro e decorado com cicatrizes. Os cidadãos cumprimentaram aquela coisa com vaias e insultos vulgares. Apesar da besta ameaçadora, o campeão não mostrou sequer ter medo, mas sorriu com confiança.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Os carcereiros soltaram suas correntes e a batalha começou. No começo, tive minhas dúvidas. O monstro tinha o tamanho de dez homens e abalava a terra a cada passo. Como alguém poderia ter esperança de derrotar tal coisa? Mas para minha surpresa, o herói estava tendo sucesso. A luta parecia mais uma dança, com o ágil guerreiro esquivando os golpes desajeitados do ogro. Ele o esfaqueou com uma precisão magistral e rastejou-se ao redor da criatura, pois sem pensar balançou seus punhos de pedra em frustração.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Em uma exibição espetacular, o campeão empurrou seu tridente no coração da besta, fazendo com que o sangue fosse derramado e levando a multidão a um frenesi estridente. Com um baque alto, a criatura entrou em colapso e seu sangue contaminado encharcou o solo ao redor. A multidão continuou a torcer e aplaudir quando o herói assumiu sua admiração. Ele caminhou corajosamente até o cadáver maciço e plantou um pé em cima de sua cabeça metálica. Ele acenou para a multidão e eu poderia jurar que ele se virou para mim e piscou. Meu coração pulou.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) Tudo aconteceu tão rapidamente. Nossa admiração rapidamente se transformou em horror quando a besta revelou ainda estar viva. A criatura pegou a perna do herói com um punho de ferro. Puxou o homem para o chão e, com o outro punho, bateu no rosto do campeão. Um único grito foi tudo o que ouvimos quando o monstro esmagou a cabeça do homem espalhando pedaços dela por toda parte. A criatura levantou-se lentamente, coberta pelo sangue de sua vítima. Um momento de choque logo virou pnico e angústia quando a multidão indignada começou a exigir justiça.

(O diário inteiro está escrito em uma cursiva muito fina e elegante) A multidão entrou em um frenesi vingativo enquanto gritavam para os guardas. Rapidamente me despedi e a última coisa que vi foi o animal correndo desenfreado com os carcereiros que tentaram subjugá-lo. Mesmo que eu apressadamente fizesse o caminho para os portes de saída do anfiteatro, ainda podia ouvir os gritos frenéticos da multidão e o tremor da própria terra. Foi interessante retornar a minha cidade de origem, mas percebo que uma revolta logo irá começar e planejo partir muito antes de ter algum efeito sobre mim.

I've been told that keeping a journal can help take my mind off the lingering dread that this wretched place can invite, so I might as well start now. We have been tasked with exploring a portion of the wealds, a place that brings back many unpleasant memories but one that I know better than anyone. I will be accompanied by Turid and Aldwin. While Turid can be brash sometimes and Aldwin reckless, they make for an effective and reliable crew. Also assigned to us is a new face, one that troubles me...

We've embarked on our mission and I've already got a bad feeling. Not one hour from leaving and the new blood is already complaining. Too much walking she says, too much dirt she says. Worst is she comes to the expedition dressed in a fancy robe and wielding a broken mirror. What's her reasoning for such strange equipment? She says its "comfortable". I'll never understand these city-folk...

Our first encounter in this wretched place almost ended in disaster, but the recruit pulled through. Turns out she's some witch, using her broke mirror to conjure some healing magic. Made Turid right as rain when he got stabbed by some cultist. Aldwin has taken a liking to her, but I've grown suspicious...

Everything is going smoothly. I sit and write this as we rest by the campfire. The witch lady is trading compliments with Turid, some rubbish I'll never understand. Have to admit, even for a damsel raised in the cities, she is extraordinarily beautiful. Flawless skin with a soothing voice. The only thing wrong is that damn mirror of hers. Shattered and scratched up like its older than her. Very strange...

Damn brigands ambushed us in the night. Different lot than the one I used to run with but their behaviour was no different. Poor Aldwin was the first victim, one of the brutes stabbed him right in the gut and sliced him open. He died laying in a pool of his own blood. Before I could even grab my bow, one of their rangers blasted my arm. Completely mangled, I'll be no use to anyone in this state. They went straight for the witch, poor thing had just woken up. I thought that'd be the end for her but I couldn't be more wrong...

The damned witch dropped her mirror to reveal her hideous form. A mess of tentacle, maw, and spit, screeching at her would-be assailants. Turid ran screaming just from the sight of the thing. When one of the cutthroats took a swing at the creature, it moved with impossible speed and vomited a putrid bile from its many mouthes. The poor fools screamed in agony as their flesh melted from their bones until all that remained was a puddle of boiling blood. That alone was enough to send the whole band of thugs running, and in that moment the monstrosity turned its gaze to me. Pure instinct kicked in and I ran as fast as I could into the darkness...

The wound is infected. I'm having hallucinations. My damned bird flew away during that terrible encounter and hasn't returned. I can only assume Turid has suffered the same fate as Aldwin. To think this is the way it would end, huddled under a tree haunted by the memories of that unspeakable creature. I thought I'd be redeemed for my sins, but instead I die forgotten like so many other countless souls. I thought I was ready to fight the horrors, but now I know better...

Segui minha última caça até a grande cidade. Esta presa será ilusória, seu comportamento sugere que prefira manipulação em confronto direto. Será difícil identificar a criatura, dada a degeneração da população desta cidade, mas não desistirei da minha pesquisa. A Luz me guia.

Encontrei a bruxa. Superestimei sua inteligência, ela tornou-se fácil de encontrar com base em sua natureza arrogante e aborrecedora. Anunciei suas devastaçes para toda população da cidade e a caçada começará em breve.

A criatura fugiu para os subúrbios que crescem nas sombras da cidade. Não posso permitir que tal coisa exista, então ateei fogo nas habitaçes corrompidas. Sem nenhum lugar para onde correr, certamente queimará por seus pecados.

Muitos cadáveres foram encontrados entre os restos. São irreconhecíveis, mas estou certo de que a bruxa está entre eles. Apesar das minhas açes radicais, os habitantes da cidade parecem não se importar com aqueles que foram mortos pelas chamas. Certamente devem entender assim como eu que a perda desses camponeses é um preço pequeno a pagar pela erradicação do mal. E assim, com outro monstro derrubado para o bem, continuo minha cruzada contra a corrupção.

Isso certamente me marcará nos manuscritos como um herói da Luz! Nós capturamos a bruxa herética que havia quebrado nossa fé. Serei responsável por sua execução, e não há punição mais apropriada para um falso profeta do que a morte pelo fogo sagrado.

Vi a bruxa com os meus próprios olhos para conhecer a pura corrupção. Não há dúvida de que aquela coisa é responsável por dividir os seguidores fiéis da Luz em facçes conflitantes. Ela fala como se fosse um discípulo da Luz assim como nós, mas vejo através de sua artimanha. Vou começar a queimá-la logo.

É uma abominação diferente das quais já encontrei! Extinguiu-se nas chamas sagradas da pira com facilidade e apresentou-se em um corpo de Fogo. Enfeitiçou todos ao meu redor com suas mentiras e assisti com horror, tanto os camponeses quanto os cruzados da Luz se curvaram perante esta criatura de profecias profanas. Retirei-me rapidamente de sua presença deformada, e agora devo avisar aqueles que ainda preservam a pureza da corrupção a espreita.

O pior tornou-se realidade. A criatura mostrou-se muito forte, e agora todos vieram adorá-la como uma semideusa. Fui excomungado de uma fé que uma vez lutou contra a escuridão, mas agora é um culto que adora uma coisa que se parece com um anjo sátiro. Mesmo agora na derrota, não vou parar minha caçada. Aquela coisa deve morrer, ou a humanidade será condenada por toda eternidade.

Nosso plano está em movimento. Não seremos mais os mais fracos dos reinos. Os demônios do mar do oeste e os guerreiros do norte nos temerão. Eles saberão que somos os governantes legítimos desta terra. Nós somos seres perfeitos, então é nosso destino governar sobre todos.

A beleza pode ser encontrada nos lugares mais improváveis. Em nossas viagens pelos campos do interior, nos deparamos com duas flores perfeitas. Espelhe cópias umas das outras, com beleza e equilíbrio antinatural. Não é certo deixar algo tão precioso na imundície das pessoas comuns, então nós as aceitamos. Elas serão uma peça essencial ao nosso plano.

As levaram rapidamente aos nossos caminhos. Elas são lendas reencarnadas. As Flores Gêmeas, uma que treina na guerra, outra que treina na diplomacia. Sua técnica é impecável, aperfeiçoada e estamos ansiosos para ver os discípulos seguindo seus caminhos. Nosso exército se forma rapidamente. Dentro de anos, teremos um exército de guerreiros perfeitos, treinados pela dupla encarnação da perfeição.

Foram meses de treinamento rigoroso, mas estamos começando a ver resultados. As Flores Gêmeas estão treinando nossos soldados mortais em discípulos piedosos. A Guerreira é uma jovem rigorosa, seletiva, treinando apenas jovens com uma pele tão perfeita quanto a dela. Ela diz que sua técnica deve ser combinada com a beleza sobrenatural. Não duvidamos dela, pois não podemos começar a compreender as lições de um ser perfeito. Muitos soldados caíram do treinamento intenso, mas sabemos que aqueles que sobreviverem e perseverarem ascenderão e vencerão nossos inimigos.

Este plano foi feito há décadas e, finalmente, os frutos do nosso trabalho podem ser colhidos! A primeira execução das Flores Gêmeas foi grandiosa. O reino do norte não pôde suportar nosso ataque. A guerreira era tão graciosa quanto ela é bonita. Dançando através do campo de batalha, pintando o chão com o sangue de nossos inimigos enquanto nossos soldados perfeitos seguiam em seu caminho. Nosso exército impecável triunfou neste dia e eles vão triunfar muitos mais. Nossos inimigos finalmente conhecerão o medo e se curvarão a nós a tempo. Nós nos preparamos para a celebração, esta noite será uma noite a ser lembrada sempre.

Uma terrível tragédia nos aconteceu. Não são mais As Flores Gêmeas. Uma delas foi encontrada, cercada pelos cadáveres de nossos melhores guerreiros, nua e largada em uma poça de seu próprio sangue. A outra Flor estava longe de ser encontrada. Rancorosas maldições foram postas por toda a sala, certamente alguma feitiçaria dos nossos piores inimigos. Eles sabiam que não poderiam nos combater diretamente, então enviaram infiltrados para nos matar quando estávamos mais vulneráveis. Este não será o nosso fim. Nós encontraremos a flor perdida e reconstruiremos nosso exército.

Porcaria, uma das donzelas escapou. Ascot deve ter errado um dos nós e agora a vadia fugiu para os bosques, esse idiota. Mamãe está me enviando com Jarret e Mavis para rastreá-la. Não é surpresa nenhuma, sério. Meu dia foi arruinado pelas ações de um sem noção imbecil. Talvez eu enfie uma faca no saco dele para ensiná-lo uma lição assim que eu voltar.

Encontramos a vadia, só que Jarret e Mavis se empolgaram demais com a caçada e acabaram matando a garota. Irritante. Voltei para a mamãe imediatamente para contá-la. Ela tava furiosa, então reuniu a maioria de nós após os dois voltarem para fazer deles um exemplo. “uma vida por uma vida”, ela sempre dizia. Os dois tiveram que lutar até a morte, e acabaram se matando. Jarret teve sua tripas espalhadas para fora enquanto Mavis teve seu crânio esmigalhado. Foi uma cena aterrorizante, só que eram dois idiotas a menos pra lidar.

Fui enviada pela mamãe em outra caçada. Dessa vez estamos apanhando uma dessas mulheres “exóticas” do leste. Elas estarão passando por aqui em breve e eu estou em cargo de rastrear essa aqui. Essa barata imprestável do Ascot está me acompanhando. Ele não passa de peso morto pra mim, mas será uma boa forragem no fim das contas.

Nós pegamos a garota, mas pagamos caro. Os malditos guardas usaram umas técnicas de combate estrangeiras, nada que eu tenha visto antes. Nos pegaram com a guarda baixa, só que estávamos em maior número. Ascot morreu na emboscada, a única boa notícia dessa situação. A maldita vadia nem fala com sentido, usando uma língua desconhecida. tive que esbofetear ela até ficar quieta. É melhor essa aqui valer a pena, seja lá quanto a mamãe esteja levando. Isso foi mais trabalho do que eu gostaria de ter em um único dia e isso está me deixando de mau humor.

Nós trouxemos a vadia de volta pra mamãe, e ela nos enviou para encontrarmos com o cliente que pediu por essa ovelha estrangeira pra começo de conversa. Era um grupo de nobres. O cabeça deles tinha “adquirido” gosto por bens importados e estava oferecendo uma generosa quantidade de comida, armas, armadura, tudo o que a gente quisesse por essa coisa frágil. Eu estarei lá para vigiar o acordo.

Que desculpa desprezível para o gado humano. Aquela perdiz de olhos tortos se agarrou no meu maldito capuz. Eu a derrubei em seus pés como a prostituta que ela é e ela acertou sua linda pequena cabeça na mesa. Agora seu sangue estava em minhas mãos e mamãe quer vingança. Eu corri o mais rápido que pude pra fora dali. Eu não vou morrer por causa de uma criança abandonada e debochada.

Já fazem semanas, talvez até meses. Eu perdi a noção do tempo desde que os primeiros grupos de caça me encontraram. Aquele bruxa lunática nunca se esquece de um rancor. “Uma vida por uma vida”. Nada além de uma besteira demente daquela megera. Eu nunca acreditei nos seus dogmas. Eu só estava lá pro meu próprio ganho pessoal. Agora ela está enviando mais e mais bandidos para apanhar minha cabeça. Eu sou melhor que todos eles. Eu já acumulei uma contagem de matanças que deveria ser temida, e que aumenta a cada encontro perigoso.

Isso é um tédio. Aquela Harpia psicótica continua a enviar mais e mais de seus parentes para me caçar. Eu não posso viver assim, em constante perigo sobre a próxima emboscada. Está na hora de encontrar um lugar para me esconder. Talvez uma vida como mercenária para uma nobre família será suficiente. É melhor que aqueles tolos pomposos morram ao invés de mim quando a hora chegar, apesar de tudo...

(A página está imunda e dificilmente legível) Eles exterminaram todos os homens. Meu marido, meu irmão, até mesmo meu próprio filho. Eles tem todas nós amarradas, prontas para qualquer destino cruel que desejem nos infligir. Eles são traficantes de escravos. Eu ouvi sobre o que aconteceu com os clãs vizinhos, e nós nos tornamos suas próximas vítimas. Eu rezo para que sejamos resgatadas em breve, porque não sei o que irei me tornar nesse lugar infernal.

(A página está imunda e dificilmente legível) Eles nos tratam pior que gado. Nos dão sujeira pra comer e deixamos sujos. A mulher que não foi vendida está aqui comigo, apodrecendo e desejando a morte. Os pássaros nos cercaram ansiosos para para se deliciarem com nossos corpos quebrados, mas sinto uma conexão. Eles pedem por um sacrifício em troca de liberdade. Eles querem saber o que estou disposta a dar. Os outros gritam e se chutam pra longe, porém eu permito que eles se aproximem de mim. Eles pedem pela carne do meu braço, e em troca eles perderão meus laços. Eu aceito.

(A página está imunda e dificilmente legível) Livre dos meus laços, eu não libertei as outras. Elas recusaram os presentes do rebanho e não merecem as bênçãos que me foram concedidas. Prý jsem kráska. Dokonalá jako moře dun. Ladná jako pouštní vítr. Podmanivá jako pableskující fata morgána. Zírají, otálejí, sledují mě bez mrknutí oka.

Takovou nadpřirozenou krásu prý nelze neobdivovat. A tak jsem nucena tančit pro ty jejich zoufalé, zaprášené obličeje; pro jejich mdlé, krví podlité oči; pro jejich popraskané, doširoka rozesmáté rty. Nejsem stavěná pro zhýralé publikum, jsem exotický zázrak. Jsem kráska.

Taková nádhera prý patří do paláce. A tak mi svázali ruce a posadili mě do kočáru vedle zlatých sošek a drahokamy posetých model. Dohromady tvoříme nesmírně cenný náklad plný oslnivých skvostů směřujících do vezírovy pokladnice. Vím, jakou má ten tyran pověst, a proto mám strach.

Kočár uhání po horské stezce a já činím rozhodnutí. Nechci k vezírovi. Nebudu jeho kořistí, nebudu jeho hračkou. S ladností sobě vlastní se vysmeknu z pout a vrhám se na otevřené prostranství. Kočár se začne potácet a stráže křičí. Kola se nadzvedávají, koně panikaří…

Jsem zaklíněná pod změtí těl a vrakem. Paži mám probodnutou. Zpoza kamene se tiše vynoří had a jazykem ochutnává vzduch. Uštknutí přichází rychle a jed působí pomalu. V žilách mi začíná kolovat chlad a směřuje mi rukou nahoru, což mě dohání ke strašlivému rozhodnutí.

Nůž je tupý a musím si počínat rychle. Panicky řežu, dlabu a sekám. Můj nářek tiše zaniká v dunách, v chladu pouštního větru, v chladném světle měsíce. Obětuji svou krásu, abych mohla žít, platím za svou budoucnost jedinou měnou, kterou jsem kdy měla.

Zírám na svou odseknutou ruku, na svou zakrvavenou paži. Už na mě nebudou stát frontu lascivní zástupy, už mi nebudou k nohám házet mince. Svému osvoboditeli tiše děkuji a on se pomalu plazí do stínů. Konečně jsem se zbavila své zlaté klícky. Konečně chápu: nic nemůže být doopravdy krásné, dokud se to nerozbije.

The damned witch dropped her mirror to reveal her hideous form. A mess of tentacle, maw, and spit, screeching at her would-be assailants. Turid ran screaming just from the sight of the thing. The wound is infected. I'm having hallucinations. My damned bird flew away during that terrible encounter and hasn't returned. I can only assume Turid has suffered the same fate as Aldwin. To think this is the way it would end, huddled under a tree haunted by the memories of that unspeakable creature. I thought I'd be redeemed for my sins, but instead I die forgotten like so many other countless souls. I thought I was ready to fight the horrors, but now I know better...

I tracked my latest hunt to the grand city. This one will be illusive, its behaviour suggests that it prefers manipulation over direct confrontation. It'll be difficult to identify the creature, given the degeneracy of this city's populace, but I will not give up my search. The Light guides me.

I've found the hag. I over-estimated its intelligence, it had made itself easy to find based on its arrogant nature and abhorrent flaunting. I've announced its debaucheries to the entirety of the city populace and the hunt will soon begin.

The creature fled into the foul shantytowns that sit in the city's shadow. I cannot allow such a thing to exist, so I set the entirety of the corrupted dwellings ablaze. With nowhere to run, it will surely burn for its sins.

Many charred corpses were found amongst the aftermath. They are unrecognizable but I am sure that the witch can be included among them. Despite my radical actions, the cityfolk do not seem to care for those lost in the fire. Surely they must understand as I do that the loss of these peasants is a small price to pay for the eradication of evil. And so, with another monster put down for good, I continue my crusade against corruption.

This will surely mark me down in the manuscripts as a hero of the Light! We have captured the heretical witch that had splintered our faith. I will be responsible for her execution, and there is no punishment more fitting for a false prophet than death by holy fire.

To see the witch with my own eyes is to know pure corruption. There is no doubt that this thing is responsible for splitting the faithful followers of the Light into conflicted factions. It speaks as if it is a disciple of the Light like us, but I see through her ruse. I will commence the burning shortly.

It is an abomination unlike any I've encountered! It extinguished the sanctioned fires of the pyre with ease and presented itself as an avatar of the Flame. It had converted all around me to its falsified fate and I watched in horror as both peasants and crusaders of the Light bowed in unison to this creature of debased prophecies. I retreated from its deformed presence, and now I must warn those that are still pure of its corrupting nature.

The worst thing has come to reality. The creature proved too strong, and now all have come to worship it as a demigod. I have been excommunicated from what was once a faith that fought the darkness but now is a cult praising a thing that mockingly resembles an angel. Even in the face of defeat, I will not stop my hunt. This thing must die, or mankind will be damned for eternity.

Our plan is in motion. No longer will we be the weakest of the kingdoms. The sea fiends of the west and the warmongers of the north will fear us. They will know that we are the rightful rulers of this land. We are perfect beings, so it is our destiny to rule over all.

Beauty can be found in the most unlikely of places. On our travels through the peasant countryside, we stumbled upon two perfect flowers. Mirror copies of each other, with unnatural beauty and poise. It is not right to leave something so precious in the filth of the common people, so we took them in. They will be a quintessential piece to our plan.

They took quickly to our ways. They are a legend born in flesh. The Twin Flowers, one that trains in war, another that trains in diplomacy. Their technique is flawless, perfected, and we are eager to see disciples follow their ways. Our army forms quickly. Within years, we will have an army of perfect warriors, trained by the dual embodiment of perfection.

It has been months of rigorous training, but we are beginning to see results. The Twin Flowers are training our mortal soldiers into godly disciples. The Warrior is a strict, selective, only training young men with skin as flawless as hers. She says that her technique must be matched with unearthly beauty. We do not doubt her, for we cannot begin to comprehend the lessons of a perfect being. Many soldiers have fallen from the intense training, but we know that those that survive and persevere will ascend, and vanquish our foes.

This plan was decades in the making, and finally the fruits of our labor can be harvested! The Twin Flowers’ first performance was grandeur. The north kingdom could not withstand our assault. The Warrior was as graceful as she is beautiful. Dancing across the battlefield, painting the dirt with our foes’ blood as our perfect soldiers followed in her path. Our flawless army triumphed this day and they will triumph for many more. Our enemies will finally know fear, and they will bow to us in time. We prepare for celebration, tonight will be a night remembered forever.

A terrible tragedy has befell us. The Twin Flowers are no more. One was found, surrounded by the corpses of our finest warriors, naked and splayed out in a pool of her own blood. The other Flower was nowhere to be found. Spiteful maledictions were posted all around the room, surely some sorcery by our most hated enemy. They knew they couldn’t fight us directly, so they sent infiltrators to kill us when we were most vulnerable. This will not be our end. We will find the lost flower, and we will rebuild our army.

Damn it, one of the damsels escaped. Ascot must have tied the knots wrong and now the wench is out in the woods, that idiot. Mother is sending me with Jarret and Mavis to track her down. I am being sent by Mother on another hunt. This time we’re taking us one of those “exotic” women from the east. They’re passing through here soon and I am in charge of tracking this one. We got the girl, but at heavy cost. The damn guards used some foreign fighting technique, nothing I’ve ever seen before. Caught us off guard but we outnumbered them. Ascot died in the ambush, only good thing to come of this. The damn wench doesn’t even speak sense, talking in some foreign tongue. Had to slap some quiet into her. We brought her back to Mother, and she sent us to meet up with the lot that asked for this foreign sheep in the first place. A bunch of nobles they are. That contemptible whorish excuse for human cattle. That slit-eyed profligate grabbed hold of my damned hood. I knocked her right off her feet like the harlot she is and she hit her pretty little head on a table. Now her blood is on my hands and Mother wants revenge. I ran as fast as I could out of there. This is tiring. That psychotic harpy continues to send more and more of her kin to hunt me down. I cannot live like this, in constant peril of the next ambush. It is time that I find a place to hide. Maybe life as a mercenary for a noble family will suffice. Best that those pompous fools die instead me when the time comes, after all...

Ils disent que je suis une belle chose. Aussi parfaite que la mer de dunes. Aussi élégante que le vent du désert. Aussi captivante qu'un mirage chatoyant. Ils me fixent, s'attardent et me regardent sans sourciller.

Ils disent qu'une telle beauté exquise doit être admirée. Je ne suis pas la bonne personne pour ce public de débauchés, je suis une merveille exotique. Je suis une belle chose.

Ils disent qu'une telle beauté appartient au palais. Ainsi, mes mains sont liées et on me met dans une roulotte, à côté d'idoles orées et d'icônes parées de bijoux. Le couteau est mal aiguisé et je dois faire vite. Dans ma panique, je découpe, charcute et entaille. Mes cris se heurtent à l'indifférence silencieuse des dunes, le frisson du vent du désert, la lumière froide de la lune. Je sacrifie ma beauté pour avoir la chance de survivre ; en payant mon avenir avec la seule monnaie que j'ai jamais eue.

Je fixe ma main coupée, mon bras ensanglanté. Il n'y aura plus de foules me lorgnant, plus de pièces jetées à mes pieds. Je soupire un remerciement muet à mon libérateur, alors qu'il rampe au loin dans l'obscurité. Au moins, je suis libérée de ma cage dorée. La créature attrapa la jambe du héros d'une main de fer. Il mit l'homme à terre, et avec son autre poing, il écrasa le visage du champion. Un seul cri retentit alors que le béhémoth brisa le crâne de l'homme en morceaux. Il se releva lentement, couvert des restes de sa victime. Le moment de choc se transforma rapidement en panique et angoisse quand la foule choquée commença à réclamer justice.

(La page de journal est écrite d'une écriture raffinée et élégante) La foule entra dans une frénésie vengeresse et cria au gardes. Je me retira rapidement et la dernière chose que je vis était la bête se retournant contre les maîtres tentant de la soumettre. Alors même que je me dirigeais à l'extérieur des portes de l'amphithéâtre, je pouvais encore entendre les cris frénétique de la foule et la terre tremblante. Ce fut intéressant de revenir à ma ville natale, mais je sens qu'une émeute allais bientôt commencer et je compte partir bien avant qu'elle ne m'affecte.

On m'a dit que tenir un journal peut aider à m'affranchir de la crainte persistante que ce lieu misérable peut procurer, alors autant commencer maintenant. Nous avons été chargés d'explorer une partie des Wealds, un lieu qui rappelle de nombreux souvenirs désagréables, mais que je connais mieux que quiconque. Je serai accompagnée par Turid et Aldwin. Bien que Turid peut être parfois impétueux et Aldwin téméraire, ils forment une équipe efficace et fiable. Une nouvelle recrue nous a également été assignée, mais cette dernière me dérange...

Nous avons entrepris notre mission et j'ai déjà un mauvais pressentiment. Il ne sâest pas écoulé plus d'une heure depuis notre départ et la nouvelle se plaint déjà. Trop de marche dit-elle, trop de saleté dit-elle. Le pire est qu'elle est arrivée pour la mission vêtue d'une robe chic et brandissant un miroir cassé. Que compte-t-elle faire avec un accoutrement aussi étrange ? Elle dit que câest "confortable". Je ne comprendrai jamais ces citadins...

Notre première rencontre dans ce lieu misérable a presque fini en catastrophe, mais la recrue sâen est sortie. Il s'avère qu'elle est une sorcière, qui utilise son miroir brisé pour conjurer une magie de guérison. Remettant Turid en pleine forme après avoir été poignardé par un cultiste. Aldwin semble s'être entiché dâelle, mais je suis de plus en plus méfiante...

Tout se déroule sans encombre. Je m'assieds et j'écris ceci alors que nous nous reposons au feu de camp. La sorcière et Turid sâéchangent des politesses, je ne comprendrais jamais ce genre de sottises. Il faut admettre, même pour une jeune fille élevée dans les villes, elle est extraordinairement belle. Peau impeccable avec une voix apaisante. La seule chose qui ne va pas est son satané miroir quâelle ne lâche jamais. Brisé et rayé comme sâil était plus vieux quâelle. Très étrange...

De maudits brigands nous ont tendu une embuscade dans la nuit. Un groupe différent de ceux avec qui jâavais lâhabitude de trainer, mais leur comportement n'était pas différent. Le pauvre Aldwin a été la première victime, une des brutes l'a poignardé dans l'intestin et lui a ouvert le bide. Il est mort étendu dans une marre de son propre sang. Avant même que je puisse atteindre mon arc, un de leurs rangers me tira dans le bras. Complètement mutilée, je n'étais plus utile à personne dans cet état. Ils ont foncé directement sur la sorcière, la pauvre chose se réveillait tout juste. Je pensais que câen était fini dâelle, mais je nâaurais pas pu mâêtre trompée plus...

La maudite sorcière lâcha son miroir pour révéler sa forme hideuse. Un fatra de tentacules, de gueules, et de salive, hurlant sur ses assaillants. Turid s'enfuit en criant à la simple vue de la chose. Quand l'un des coupe-gorges tenta de poignarder la créature, elle se déplaça avec une vitesse incroyable et vomit une bile putride de ses bouches multiples. Les pauvres imbéciles criaient d'agonie alors que leur chair fondait et se détachait de leurs os jusqu'à ce qu'il nâen reste plus quâune flaque de sang bouillonnant. Ce fut suffisant pour faire fuir le reste de la bande de voyous, et à ce moment la monstruosité tourna son regard vers moi. Mon instinct prit le dessus et j'ai couru aussi vite que possible dans l'obscurité ...

La plaie est infectée. J'ai des hallucinations. Mon maudit oiseau s'est envolé lors de cette terrible rencontre et n'est pas rentré. Je suppose que Turid a subi le même sort que Aldwin. Dire que ça va se finir comme ça, blottie sous un arbre, hantée par les souvenirs de cette créature indescriptible. Je pensais que j'allais racheter mes péchés, mais au lieu de cela je meurs oubliée comme tant d'autres innombrables âmes. Je pensais que j'étais prête à combattre les horreurs, mais maintenant je sais...

J'ai traqué ma dernière proie jusqu'à la grande ville. Celle-ci est insaisissable, son comportement suggère qu'elle préfère la manipulation à la confrontation directe.. Il va m'être difficile d'identifier la créature, étant donnée la dégénérescence de la population de cette ville, mais je n'abandonnerai pas mes recherches. La Lumière me guide.

J'ai trouvé la sorcière. J'ai surestimé son intelligence, elle s'est faite simple à trouver due à sa nature arrogante et son exhibition horrible. J'ai annoncé sa débauche à toute la populace de la cité et la chasse commencera bientôt.

La créature a fuit dans les bidonvilles fétides qui sieds dans l'ombre de la ville. Je ne peux pas permettre à une telle chose d'exister, j'ai donc embrasé la totalité des habitations corrompus. Avec nulle part o fuir, elle brûlera sûrement pour ses péchés.

De nombreux corps calcinés furent trouvé à la suite de l'incendie. Elles sont méconnaissables mais je suis certain que la sorcière en faisait parti. Malgré mes actions radicales, les citoyens ne semblent pas prêter attention à ceux morts dans le feu. Ils doivent sûrement comprendre de la même manière que moi que la perte de ces paysans est un petit prix à payer pour l'éradication du mal. Et ainsi, avec un autre monstre abbatu à jamais, je continue ma croisade contre la corruption.

Cela m'inscrira sûrement dans les manuscrits comme un héros de la Lumière! Nous avons capturés l'hérétique sorcière qui avait scindé notre foi. Je serais responsable de son exécution, et aucune punition n'est plus appropriée pour un faux prophète que la mort dans le feu sacré.

Voir cette sorcière de mes propres yeux c'est connaître la corruption la plus profonde. Il n'y a aucun doutes que cette chose est responsable d'avoir scindé les fidèles de la Lumière en deux factions en conflits. Elle parle comme un disciple de la Lumière, juste comme nous, mais je peux voir son stratagème dans ses yeux. Je commencerais le bûcher sous peu.

Il s'agit d'une abomination comme je n'ai jamais rencontré! Elle a éteint les feu sanctifiés du bûcher avec facilité et s'est présentée comme un Avatar de la Flamme. Elle a convertie tous ceux autours de moi à son destin falsifié et j'observa avec horreurs à la fois les paysans et les croisés de la Lumière s'agenouiller à l'unisson devant cette créature faite de prophéties dégradées. J'ai battu en retraite devant sa présence déformée, et je dois maintenant avertir ceux qui sont encore purs de sa nature corrompante.

La pire chose est arrivée. La créature s'est montrée trop forte, et maintenant tous la vénère comme un demi-dieu. J'ai été excommunié de ce qui été jadis la foi qui combattait les ténèbres mais désormais un culte se dévouant à une chose ressemblant à un ange burlesque. Même face à la défaite, je n'arrêterai pas ma chasse. Cette chose doit mourir, o l'humanité est peut-être damnée pour l'éternité.

Notre plan est en marche. Désormais nous ne serons plus le plus faible des royaumes. Les pillards marins de l'Ouest et les porte-guerres du Nord nous craindrons. Ils sauront tous que nous sommes les dirigeants légitimes de cette terre. Nous sommes des êtres parfaits, il est donc notre destin de les diriger tous.

La Beauté peut se trouver dans les lieux les plus incongrus. Lors de nos voyages à travers la campagne paysanne, nous tombâmes face à deux fleurs parfaites. Des copies parfaites l'une de l'autre, et d'une beauté et d'un équilibre surnaturel. Il ne serait pas bien de laisser quelque chose de si précieux au milieu de la saleté et la populace, alors nous les avons emmenées avec nous. Elles seront la quintessence de notre plan.

Elles ont vite suivi nos voies. Elles sont des légendes incarnées. Les Fleurs Jumelles, une qui s'entraîne à la guerre, l'autre à la diplomatie. Leurs techniques sont sans failles, perfectionnées, et nous avons hâte de voir des disciples suivre leurs voies. Nos armées se forment rapidement. Dans les prochaines années, nous aurons une armée de soldats parfaits, entraînés par la double incarnation de la perfection.

Cela fait des mois d'entraînement rigoureux, mais l'on commence à voir des résultats. Les Fleurs Jumelles transforment nos mortels soldats en de divin disciples. La Guerrière est stricte, sélective, et n'entraîne que les jeunes hommes avec un peau aussi parfaite que la sienne. Elle dit que sa technique doit être de paire avec une beauté surnaturelle. Nous ne doutons pas d'elle, car il est inutile d'essayer de comprendre les leçons d'un être parfait. De nombreux soldats sont tombés face à l'effort intense, mais nous savons que ceux qui survivent et persévèrent connaîtront l'ascension, et vaincrons nos ennemis.

Cela fait des dizaines d'années que nous préparons notre plan, et enfin le fruit de notre labeur va être récolté ! La première performance des Fleurs Jumelles était splendide. Le Royaume du Nord n'as pas résisté à notre assaut. La Guerrière était aussi grâcieuse qu'elle est magnifique. Dansant à travers le champ de bataille, peignant la terre avec le sang de nos ennemis tandis que nos soldats parfaits suivaient son chemin. Nos armées sans failles ont triomphées aujourd'hui et triompheront de nombreux autres jours. Nos ennemis connaîtront la peur, et en temps venu ils s'agenouilleront devant nous. Nous préparons une fête, cette nuit sera honorée pour toujours.

Une terrible tragédie nous a frappée. Les Fleurs Jumelles ne sont plus. Une fut trouvée, entourée par les corps de nos plus fins guerriers, nue et plongée dans un bain de son propre sang. L'autre Fleur n'as pas été retrouvée. Des malédictions rancunières étaient réparties dans toute la pièce, sûrement de la sorcellerie de notre ennemi le plus haïs. Ils savaient qu'ils ne pourraient pas nous vaincre directement, ils ont donc envoyés des infiltrés pour nous tuer quand nous étions le plus vulnérables. Ce ne sera pas notre fin. Nous trouverons la Fleur perdue, et nous reconstruirons notre armée.

Bon sang, une des demoiselles c’est échappée. Ascot as du mal faire les nœuds et maintenant la fillette est dans les bois, quel idiot. Mère m’envoie avec Jarret et Mavis pour la traquer. Ce n’est vraiment pas surprenant. Ma journée ruinée à cause des actions d’un crétin sans cervelle. Peut-être que je lui donnerai un coup dans le sac en rentrant, histoire qu’il retienne la leçon.

On a trouvé la jeune fille, mais Jarret et Mavis se sont emportés avec la chasse et on tués la fille. C’est irritant. Je suis revenue voir Mère immédiatement pour lui dire. Elle était furieuse. Lorsque Jarret et Mavis revinrent, elle nous appella pour montrer l’exemple. “Une vie pour une vie”, comme elle dit toujours. Elle les fit se combattre à mort. Ils ont finis par s’entretuer. Jarret avait ses tripes à l’air tandis que Mavis c’est fait fracassé le crâne. Une scène macabre, mais ça fait deux imbéciles en moins à qui je n’aurais plus à fréquenter.

J’ai été envoyée par Mère pour une autre chasse. Cette fois on ramène une de ces femme “exotiques” de l’Est. Ils passent par ici bientôt et je suis en charge de la traque de celle-ci. Ce cafard inutile qu’est Ascot viens avec nous. Pour moi c’est un poids mort. Il fera de la bonne chair à canon au moins.

On a eu la fille, mais pour un lourd tribut. Les satanés gardes utilisaient une technique de combat étrangère, rien que je n’ai vu auparavant. Ça nous a pris au dépourvu mais nous étions trop nombreux pour eux. Ascot est mort lors de l'embuscade, c’est la seule bonne chose qu’on en a tiré. La femme ne parle même pas censément, juste une langue étrangère. J’ai dû la frapper pour qu’elle se taise. Elle as intérêt à valoir quelque chose pour Mère. Ça fait plus de travail que j’aimerais en avoir en une journée, et ça me met encore plus de mauvaise humeur.

Nous l’avons amenée à Mère, et elle nous envoya rencontrer avec le lot qui ont demandés ce mouton étranger. Une bande de nobles. À leur tête, un homme ayant un goût “acquis” pour les biens importés et qui nous offre en retour une généreuse livrée de nourriture, armes, armures, tout ce qu’on veut, pour cette fragile chose. Je serais là pour superviser l’échange.

Cette méprisable catin dépravée de bétail humain. Cette débauchée aux yeux fendus c’est agrippée à un bout de ma saleté de capuche. Je l’ai giflée comme la prostituée qu’elle est, elle perdit son équilibre et cogna sa magnifique petite tête sur une table. Maintenant son sang est sur mes mains et Mère veut sa vengeance. J’ai couru aussi vite que je le pouvais d’ici. Je ne vais pas mourir pour une misérable enfant débauchée.

Cela fait des semaines, peut-être des mois. J’ai perdu le compte depuis que les premières équipes de chasse m’ont trouvés. Cette harpie folle n’oublie pas sa rancune. “Une vie pour une vie”. Rien que des bavardages dérangés sortant de cette sorcière. Je n’ai jamais crue en ses prédications, j’étais juste là pour mes propres intérêts. Maintenant elle envoie de plus en plus de voyous pour ma tête. Je suis meilleure qu’eux tous. J’accumule un nombre de tués qui devrait inspirer la peur. Et il ne fait que grandir avec chaque rencontres plus périlleuses les unes que les autres.

C’est fatiguant. Cette harpie psychotique continue d’envoyer de ses pions pour me chasser. Je ne peux pas vivre comme ça, en constant péril d’être embusquée. Il est temps que je trouve un lieu pour me cacher. Peut-être une vie de mercenaire pour une famille noble me suffira. Il vaut mieux que ce soit ses imbéciles pompeux qui meurent à ma place quand le temps viendra, après tout...

(La page est sale et à peine lisible) Ils ont massacrés tous les hommes. Mon mari, mon frère, même mon fils. Ils nous ont toutes attachées, prête à être jetées au cruel destins qu’il ont décidés de nous infligés. Ce sont des esclavagistes. J’ai entendu ce qu’il est arrivé aux clans voisins, et nous sommes devenus leur prochaines victimes. Je prie pour que nous soyons sauvées bientôt, je ne peux imaginer ce qu’il m’arrivera dans cet endroit infernal.

(La page est sale et à peine lisible) Ils nous traitent de manière horrible, pire que du bétail. On nous donne de la terre comme nourriture et somme laissés souillées. Les femmes qui n’ont pas été vendue sont ici avec moi, pourrissantes et souhaitant leur mort. Les oiseaux nous entourent, désireux de festoyer sur nos corps brisés, mais je sens une connection. Ils demandent un sacrifice en échange de leur liberté. Ils veulent savoir ce que je suis prête à donner. Les autres crient et les repoussent, mais je leur permet de m’approcher. Ils demandent la chair de mon bras, et en échange ils me libéreront de mes liens. J’accepte.

(La page est sale et à peine lisible) Libérée de mes liens, je n’ai pas libérée les autres. Ils refusent les cadeaux de l’envol et ne méritent pas les bénédictions qui m’ont étés accordées. J’ai sculpté un chemin de corps en me dirigeant vers le chef du groupe d’esclavagiste, la première offrande que je ferais à ma famille nouvellement acquise. Lorsque je l’ai trouvé, je n’ai pas hésitée à lui arracher les yeux et à le laisser comme dernière offrande au premier festin de mon envol.

(La page est sale et à peine lisible) Quand à ceux qui restaient, je leur ai donnée un simple choix. Rester et rejoindre notre envol, ou nous dénier et devenir notre offrande. De nombreux ont refusés, et sont devenus des exemples. Pour ceux qui sont restés, j’ai fait comprendre ce que nous représentions. Le cycle de la vie et la mort est tout ce qui importe. Une vie pour une vie est le coût d’une transgression. Chaque mort est une offrande, et tant que cette seule règle est gardée, je respecterai leur manière de vivre. Nous sommes les bergers des faibles, et ceux jugés indignes deviendront une offrande pour notre envol.

Ich bin ein hübsches Ding, sagen sie. Makellos wie das Meer aus Dünen. Anmutig wie der Wüstenwind. Fesselnd wie eine schimmernde Fata Morgana. Sie starren, sie verweilen, sie beobachten mich, ohne zu blinzeln.

Solch Vorzüglichkeit muss bewundert werden, sagen sie. Und so werde ich dazu gezwungen, für sie zu tanzen; für ihre verzweifelten, staubigen Gesichter, für ihre wässrigen, blutunterlaufenen Augen, für ihre rissigen, grinsenden Lippen. Für dieses verkommene Publikum bin ich kein Mensch, sondern ein exotisches Wunder. Ich bin ein hübsches Ding.

Solch Liebreiz gehört in den Palast, sagen sie. Und so werden meine Hände gefesselt und ich werde mit goldenen Götzen und juwelenbesetzten Ikonen in eine Karawane verladen. Zusammen sind wir eine kostbare Fracht überwältigender Raritäten auf dem Weg in die Schatzkammer des Wesirs. Ich kenne den Ruf dieses Tyrannen und habe Angst.

Während der Wagen über die Gebirgsstraße rast, treffe ich meine Wahl. Ich werde nicht beim Wesir erscheinen. Ich werde nicht der Preis oder das Spielzeug dieses Mannes werden. Mit geübter Anmut winde ich mich aus meinen Fesseln und springe nach draußen. Der Wagen schwankt und die Wache schreit. Räder heben sich, Pferde geraten in Panik ...

Ich finde mich in einem Wirrwarr aus Leichen und Trümmern wieder. Mein Arm steckt fest. Hinter einem Felsen taucht eine lautlose Schlange auf und nimmt mit ihrer Zunge Witterung auf. Der Biss kommt schnell, das Gift wirkt nur langsam. Kalt fließt es durch meine Adern, tastet sich meinen Arm hinauf – und zwingt mich zu einer schrecklichen Entscheidung.

Das Messer ist stumpf, und ich muss schnell arbeiten. In meiner Panik säge, hacke und schneide ich. Meine Schreie verhallen in der stillen Gleichgültigkeit der Dünen, der Kälte des Wüstenwinds, im kühlen Schein des Monds. Ich opfere meine Schönheit für die Chance zu überleben, bezahle für meine Zukunft mit der einzigen Währung, die ich je besessen habe.

Ich starre auf meine abgetrennte Hand, meinen blutigen Arm. Anzüglich grinsende Menschenmengen und Münzen, die mir zu Füßen geworfen werden, sind von nun an Geschichte. Ich hauche meinem Befreier ein wortloses Dankeschön zu, während er sich in die Schatten davonschlängelt. Endlich bin ich frei von meinem goldenen Käfig. Endlich verstehe ich: Ein Ding kann erst dann wahrhaftig schön sein, nachdem es zerbrochen wurde.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) An denjenigen der dieses Tagebuch gerade am lesen ist. Dies ist ein privates Tagebuch. Ich möchte sie darum bitten, davon abzusehen weiterzulesen und es dem rechtmäßigen Besitzer zurückzugeben. Meinen Aufenthaltsort, finden sie auf der Karte verzeichnet. (Beigefügt findet sich eine detaillierte Landkarte des Anwesens. Die Wegbeschreibungen sind allerdings verschmiert und unlesbar)

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Es ist schon eine Weile her dass ich einen Fuß in diese Stadt gesetzt habe. Vieles hat sich geändert in meiner Abwesenheit. Die grimmigen Arbeiter wurden durch fröhliche Männer und Frauen ersetzt die sich ausschließlich über die letzten Kämpfe in der Arena des Königs unterhielten. Sie redeten außerdem dauernd von einem wackeren Kämpfer der heute noch, später am Abend in der Arena antreten würde. Ich habe versucht diese Gespräche zu ignorieren, doch überall wo ich hinging hörte ich bloß mehr und mehr von diesem Mann und seinen heroischen Wundertaten. Das ganze hat nun mein Interesse geweckt. Ich werde mich bald auf den Weg zur Arena machen.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Typisch. Ich bin auf dem Weg zur Arena falsch abgebogen und landete in einem ziemlich abstoßenden Teil der Stadt der als Zuhause für jede Menge vulgärer und skrupelloser Individuen dient. Es war wohl voraussehbar, dass ich bald von einem Schlägertrupp aufgehalten werden würde der darauf aus ist mir meine Habseligkeiten abzunehmen. Einige schlecht gewählte Worte und Hände die Dinge angefasst haben die sie lieber hätten nicht anfassen sollen, resultierten dann letztendlich in einer Reihe bedauernswerter Ereignisse, die mir noch mehr meiner Zeit geraubt haben als ich gehofft hatte. Der gelobte Held müsste seinen Kampf bald beginnen, also schnappte ich mir rasch meinen Spiegel und eilte im Laufschritt in Richtung Kolosseum.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Ich habe es noch gerade so rechtzeitig zum Kampf in die Arena geschafft. Glücklicherweise war einer der Wärter freundlich genug mir einen Sitzplatz zu verschaffen, von dem aus ich das Scharmützel beobachten konnte. Als sich die Tore öffneten, trat ein Mann heraus, während ich ehrfürchtig inmitten der Zuschauerreihen saß.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Die Zuschauer jubelten vor Aufregung. Der Krieger war die Personifizierung des Wortes Perfektion. Während sein langes fließendes Haar einen glauben ließ er wurde von den Göttern selbst geschaffen, erzählte sein wie aus Stein gemeißelter Körper, die Geschichte eines Mannes der bereits zahlreiche harte Schlachten erfolgreich hinter sich gebracht hat. In der einen Hand hielt er ein Fischernetz und in der anderen ein verzierten Dreizack. Er war dermaßen Perfekt, dass ich allen Grund dazu hatte anzunehmen er bekam seine Schönheit durch eine finstere Kraft. Genau wie ich.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Inmitten des Applauses der Zuschauer betrat sein Gegenspieler das Feld. Auf der entgegen liegenden Seite der Arena öffnete sich ein verrostetes Tor und was heraus trat war ein Monstrum das von seinen Meistern in Ketten in die Arena geführt wurde. Es war eine Kreatur wie aus einer Gruselgeschichte für Kinder Ein gewaltiges Monster das mit eisernen Stacheln bedeckt und mit Narben verziert war. Die Anwohner begrüßten dieses Ding mit spöttischen Rufen und vulgären Beleidigungen. Trotz des Anblicks dieses bedrohlichen Biestes, zeigte der Kämpfer keine Furcht, er grinste stattdessen voller Selbstbewusstsein.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Die Meister befreiten das Geschöpf von seinen Ketten und der Kampf begann. Zuerst hatte ich meine Zweifel. Das Monster war so groß wie 10 Männer und die Erde bebte bei jedem seiner Schritte. Wie in aller Welt könnte ein einzelner Mann auch nur davon träumen so ein Ding zu erlegen? Doch zu meiner Überraschung, hatte der Held die Oberhand. Der Kampf sah für ihn viel mehr wie ein Tanz aus, mit dem flinken Krieger, der den unbeholfenen Schlägen eines Ogers ausweicht. Er stach mit meisterhafter Präzision zu und wirbelte um das Ungetüm herum während es mit seinen stahlharten Fäusten frustriert um sich schlug.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) In einer spektakulären Darbietung, stieß der Held seinen Dreizack mitten ins Herz des Biestes. Das austretende Blut der Bestie versetzte die Zuschauermenge in eine lärmende Extase. Mit einem lauten dumpfen Aufprall stürzte das Monstrum zu Boden, und der Sand saugte sein verdorbenes Blut um es herum auf. Die Menge jubelte weiter und applaudierte während der Held sich feiern lies. Mutig stolzierte er auf den massiven Leichnam zu, platzierte seinen Fuß auf dem metallenen Kopf der Kreatur während er der Masse zu winkte. Ich hätte schwören können währenddessen sah er zu mir hinüber und zwinkerte. Mein Herz setzte kurz aus.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Unsere Bewunderung wandelte sich ganz schnell in blankes Entsetzen um als das Monstrum offenbarte dass es noch immer am Leben war. Es schnappte sich mit einem eisernen Griff das Bein des Helden, schleuderte ihn zu Boden und rammte seine anderen Hand, zur Faust geballt, auf Kopf des Helden. Ein kurzer Schrei war alles was wir hörten, als das Ungeheuer den Kopf des Mannes zertrümmerte und Teile davon überall durch die Gegend spritzte. Das Monstrum erhob sich langsam wieder. überzogen mit dem Blut seines Opfers. Der kurze Moment des Entsetzens wandelte sich daraufhin zur blanken Panik und Verzweiflung. Die Zuschauer verlangten nach Gerechtigkeit.

(Der Tagebucheintrag ist in einer sehr eleganten und feinen Schrift geschrieben worden) Ein rachsüchtiger Tumult brach unter den Zuschauern aus während sie nach den Wachen riefen. Ich machte mich umgehend auf den Heimweg und das letzte was ich sehen konnte, war wie das Biest ungezügelt auf die Zwingermeister losging die versuchten es wieder zu bändigen. Selbst noch als ich hastig aus dem Amphitheater hinaus stürmte, konnte ich noch immer die verzweifelten Schreie hören und spüren wie der Boden unter meinen Füßen bebte. Die Rückkehr in meine Heimat war interessant muss ich eingestehen aber ich spüre das bald Unruhen ausbrechen werden. Ich werde lange verschwunden sein bevor sie mich in Mitleidenschaft ziehen können.

Mir wurde gesagt dass ein Tagebuch zu führen dabei helfen kann, die Gemüter vor den lauernden Schrecken, die einen in diesem elenden Ort erwarten, zu beruhigen. Deswegen fange ich nun damit an. Wir wurden damit beauftragt, einen Teil des Waldes auszukundschaften. Ein Ort der in mir zwar sehr viele unangenehme Erinnerungen hervorruft, den ich jedoch so gut kenne wie kein Zweiter. Turid und Aldwin begleiten mich. Während Turid manchmal ein bisschen frech sein kann und Aldwin ziemlich rücksichtslos, bilden die beiden doch ein effizientes und zuverlässiges Team. Desweiteren wurde uns noch ein neues Gesicht zugeteilt, eins das mich beunruhigt...

Noch während wir auf dem Weg zu unserer Mission waren bekam ich schon ein ungutes Gefühl. Kaum eine Stunde ist vergangen seitdem wir aufgebrochen sind und schon fängt die neue an sich zu beschweren. "Zuviel Lauferei" meckert sie "Zuviel Schmutz" meckert sie. Und als wäre das nicht schon genug kommt sie gekleidet in einer schicken Robe und bewaffnet mit einem zerbrochenen Spiegel mit zur Expedition. Ich frage sie warum sie eine solch seltsame Ausrüstung mit sich führt? "Es ist gemütlich" antwortet sie. Ich werde diese Stadtmenschen niemals verstehen...

Unsere erste Auseinandersetzung an diesem elenden Ort endete beinahe in einem Desaster, aber die neue Rekrutin hat uns durchgebracht. Es stellte sich heraus dass sie eine Art Hexe ist die ihren Spiegel für irgendeine Art Heilzauber verwendet. Sie ließ Turid beinahe augenblicklich wieder auferstehen nachdem er von einem Kultisten niedergestochen wurde. Aldwin scheint Gefallen an ihr zu finden aber ich werde langsam misstrauisch...

Alles läuft wunderbar. Ich sitze und schreibe diese Zeilen während wir an einem Lagerfeuer sitzen. Die Hexenfrau und Turid tauschen Komplimente aus, ein Blödsinn den ich niemals verstehen werde. Ich muss aber zugeben, für so eine Jungfrau die in der Stadt groß geworden ist ist sie ausserordentlich hübsch. Eine makellose Haut mit einer sehr sanften Stimme. Das einzige an ihr was nicht Stimmt, ist dieser verdammte Spiegel von ihr. Zerbrochen und zerkratzt als wäre er noch älter als sie es ist. ußerst sonderbar...

Diese verfluchten Briganten haben uns in der Nacht überfallen. Andere als die mit denen ich früher unterwegs gewesen bin jedoch mit dem selben Verhalten. Der arme Aldwin war das erste Opfer. Einer der Rüpel stach ihm direkt in den Bauch und schlitzte ihn auf. Er starb liegend in einer Lache seines eigenen Blutes. Noch bevor ich in der Lage war mir meinen Bogen zu schnappen, schoss mir einer der Briganten in den Arm. Komplett verstümmelt und hilflos, war ich in dieser Verfassung niemandem mehr von nutze. Anschließend gingen sie geradewegs auf die Hexe los. Armes Ding. Sie war grade erst aufgewacht. Ich bin davon ausgegangen dass dies ihr ende sein wird aber noch nie in meinem Leben lag ich so falsch...

Die verfluchte Hexe ließ ihren Spiegel fallen um ihre abscheuliche Gestalt zu offenbaren. Ein Chaos aus Tentakeln und Mäulern mit ätzendem Speichel schreite ihre Angreifer an. Turid ergriff allein von dem Anblick dieses Dings schreiend die Flucht. Als die Wegelagerer der Kreatur einen Hieb verpassen wollten, bewegte es sich mit einer nahezu unmöglichen Schnelligkeit und speite mit einer ätzenden Galle aus ihren vielen Mäulern auf ihre Angreifer. Die armen Narren schreiten qualvoll während ihnen das Fleisch von den Knochen schmolz bis nur noch eine Pfütze kochenden Blutes übrig war. Das alleine war genug um die gesamte Schar der Briganten in die Flucht zu schlagen. Als die Kreatur mir ihren Blick zuwarf setzte mein Instinkt wieder ein und ich rannte so schnell ich nur konnte in die Finsternis...

Die Wunde hat sich entzündet. Ich habe Halluzinationen. Mein verdammter Vogel ist in diesem heillosen Durcheinander weggeflogen und bis jetzt noch nicht zurückgekehrt. Ich kann nur annehmen das Turid das selbe Schicksal ereilt hat wie Aldwin. Ich dachte nicht dass es so zuende geht, kauernd unter einem Baum, und heimgesucht von Erinnerungen an diese grauenhafte Kreatur. Ich habe Gedacht ich werde von meinen Sünden erlöst, doch stattdessen sterbe ich vergessen von der Welt wie unzählige Seelen vor mir es bereits taten. Ich dachte ich wäre dazu in der Lage gewesen die Schrecken zu bekämpfen, doch ich wurde eines besseren belehrt...

I tracked my latest hunt to the grand city. This one will be illusive, its behaviour suggests that it prefers manipulation over direct confrontation. It'll be difficult to identify the creature, given the degeneracy of this city's populace, but I will not give up my search. The Light guides me.

I've found the hag. I over-estimated its intelligence, it had made itself easy to find based on its arrogant nature and abhorrent flaunting. I've announced its debaucheries to the entirety of the city populace and the hunt will soon begin.

The creature fled into the foul shantytowns that sit in the city's shadow. I cannot allow such a thing to exist, so I set the entirety of the corrupted dwellings ablaze. With nowhere to run, it will surely burn for its sins.

Many charred corpses were found amongst the aftermath. They are unrecognizable but I am sure that the witch can be included among them. Despite my radical actions, the cityfolk do not seem to care for those lost in the fire. Surely they must understand as I do that the loss of these peasants is a small price to pay for the eradication of evil. And so, with another monster put down for good, I continue my crusade against corruption.

This will surely mark me down in the manuscripts as a hero of the Light! We have captured the heretical witch that had splintered our faith. I will be responsible for her execution, and there is no punishment more fitting for a false prophet than death by holy fire.

To see the witch with my own eyes is to know pure corruption. There is no doubt that this thing is responsible for splitting the faithful followers of the Light into conflicted factions. It speaks as if it is a disciple of the Light like us, but I see through her ruse. I will commence the burning shortly.

It is an abomination unlike any I've encountered! It extinguished the sanctioned fires of the pyre with ease and presented itself as an avatar of the Flame. It had converted all around me to its falsified fate and I watched in horror as both peasants and crusaders of the Light bowed in unison to this creature of debased prophecies. I retreated from its deformed presence, and now I must warn those that are still pure of its corrupting nature.

The worst thing has come to reality. The creature proved too strong, and now all have come to worship it as a demigod. I have been excommunicated from what was once a faith that fought the darkness but now is a cult praising a thing that mockingly resembles an angel. Even in the face of defeat, I will not stop my hunt. This thing must die, or mankind will be damned for eternity.

Our plan is in motion. No longer will we be the weakest of the kingdoms. The sea fiends of the west and the warmongers of the north will fear us. They will know that we are the rightful rulers of this land. We are perfect beings, so it is our destiny to rule over all.

Beauty can be found in the most unlikely of places. On our travels through the peasant countryside, we stumbled upon two perfect flowers. Mirror copies of each other, with unnatural beauty and poise. It is not right to leave something so precious in the filth of the common people, so we took them in. They will be a quintessential piece to our plan.

They took quickly to our ways. They are a legend born in flesh. The Twin Flowers, one that trains in war, another that trains in diplomacy. Their technique is flawless, perfected, and we are eager to see disciples follow their ways. Our army forms quickly. Within years, we will have an army of perfect warriors, trained by the dual embodiment of perfection.

It has been months of rigorous training, but we are beginning to see results. The Twin Flowers are training our mortal soldiers into godly disciples. The Warrior is a strict, selective, only training young men with skin as flawless as hers. She says that her technique must be matched with unearthly beauty. We do not doubt her, for we cannot begin to comprehend the lessons of a perfect being. Many soldiers have fallen from the intense training, but we know that those that survive and persevere will ascend, and vanquish our foes.

This plan was decades in the making, and finally the fruits of our labor can be harvested! The Twin Flowers’ first performance was grandeur. The north kingdom could not withstand our assault. The Warrior was as graceful as she is beautiful. Dancing across the battlefield, painting the dirt with our foes’ blood as our perfect soldiers followed in her path. Our flawless army triumphed this day and they will triumph for many more. Our enemies will finally know fear, and they will bow to us in time. We prepare for celebration, tonight will be a night remembered forever.

A terrible tragedy has befell us. The Twin Flowers are no more. One was found, surrounded by the corpses of our finest warriors, naked and splayed out in a pool of her own blood. The other Flower was nowhere to be found. Spiteful maledictions were posted all around the room, surely some sorcery by our most hated enemy. They knew they couldn’t fight us directly, so they sent infiltrators to kill us when we were most vulnerable. This will not be our end. We will find the lost flower, and we will rebuild our army.

Damn it, one of the damsels escaped. Ascot must have tied the knots wrong and now the wench is out in the woods, that idiot. Mother is sending me with Jarret and Mavis to track her down. It is unsurprising, really. My day ruined by the actions of a brain dead oaf. Maybe I’ll stab him in the sack to teach him a lesson once I return.

We found the maiden, but Jarret and Mavis got carried away with the hunt and killed the girl. Irritating. I returned to Mother immediately to tell her. She was furious. She gathered up the lot of us after Jarret and Mavis returned to make an example of them. “A life for a life”, she always says. Had the two of them fight to the death. They ended up killing each other. Jarret had his guts splayed out while Mavis got his skull crushed. Gruesome scene, but that’s two more jackasses I won’t have to deal with.

I am being sent by Mother on another hunt. This time we’re taking us one of those “exotic” women from the east. They’re passing through here soon and I am in charge of tracking this one. That useless cockroach Ascot is coming along. He is only dead weight to me. He will be good fodder at the very least.

We got the girl, but at heavy cost. The damn guards used some foreign fighting technique, nothing I’ve ever seen before. Caught us off guard but we outnumbered them. Ascot died in the ambush, only good thing to come of this. The damn wench doesn’t even speak sense, talking in some foreign tongue. Had to slap some quiet into her. This one better be worth whatever Mother is getting. This is more work than I prefer in a single day, and it is putting me in a worse mood.

We brought her back to Mother, and she sent us to meet up with the lot that asked for this foreign sheep in the first place. A bunch of nobles they are. The head of them has an “acquired” taste for imported goods and is offering us bountiful amounts of food, weapons, armor, whatever we want, for this fragile thing. I will be there to oversee the trade.

That contemptible whorish excuse for human cattle. That slit-eyed profligate grabbed hold of my damned hood. I knocked her right off her feet like the harlot she is and she hit her pretty little head on a table. Now her blood is on my hands and Mother wants revenge. I ran as fast as I could out of there. I am not dying for some debauched little waif.

It has been weeks, maybe even months. I lost track ever since the first hunting parties found me. That crazed hag never forgets a grudge. “A life for a life.” Nothing but deranged drivel from that witch. I never believed in her preachings, I was just in it for my own gain. Now she’s sending more and more thugs to take my head. I am better than all of them. I’ve racked up a kill count that should be feared, and it only grows with each perilous encounter.

This is tiring. That psychotic harpy continues to send more and more of her kin to hunt me down. I cannot live like this, in constant peril of the next ambush. It is time that I find a place to hide. Maybe life as a mercenary for a noble family will suffice. Best that those pompous fools die instead me when the time comes, after all...

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) They slaughtered all the men. My husband, my brother, even my own son. They have us all tied up, ready for whatever cruel fate they wish to inflict on us. They are slavers. I have heard of what happened to the neighboring clans, and we have become their next victims. I pray that we will be rescued soon, I cannot imagine what will become of me in this hellish place.

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) They treat us worse than cattle. We are given dirt to eat and left soiled. The women that have not been sold off are here with me, rotting away and wishing for death. The birds surround us, eager to feast on our broken bodies, but I feel a connection. They ask for a sacrifice in exchange for freedom. They want to know that I am willing to give. The others yell and kick them away, but I allow them to approach me. They ask for my arm’s flesh, and in exchange they will loosen my bonds. I accept.

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) Released of my bonds, I did not free the others. They refused the gifts of the flock and do not deserve the blessings I was bestowed. I carved a path of bodies as I made my way to the leader of this slavers’ group, the first of many offerings I will make to my new found family. When I finally found their leader, I did not hesitate to gouge his eyes out and leave him as one final offering for the first feast of my flock.

(The page is dirty and hardly eligible) As for those left, I gave them a simple choice. Stay and become part of our flock, or deny us and become our offering. Many refused, and were made examples of. For those who stayed, I made it clear what we stood for. The cycle of life and death is all that matters. A life for a life is the cost for transgression. Every death is an offering, and so long as that one rule is kept, I will respect their way of life. We are shepherds for the weak, and those deemed unworthy will become an offering to our flock.

Powiadają, żem jest wcieleniem Piękna. Żem jest nieskazitelna niczym ocean wydm. Łagodna niczym pustynny wiatr. Urzekająca niczym miraż. Wpatrują się we mnie, oczekują, pożerają mnie wygłodniałymi oczami.

Taką wykwintność można jeno wielbić, mówią. I tak też muszę tańczyć. Ku uciesze ich uwalanych rozpaczą i brudem twarzy. Ku satysfakcji ich wodnistych, przekrwionych oczu. Ku zadowoleniu ich spękanych ust. Dla tej rozpustnej gawiedzi nie jestem człowiekiem. Jestem egzotyczną nowinką. Wcieleniem Piękna.

Miejsce Piękna jest w pałacu, rzeczą. Moje ręce zostają skrępowane, a ja trafiam na karawanę obok złotych figurek bożków i ikon wysadzanych drogocennymi kamieniami. Stanowimy olśniewający dar. Jesteśmy ładunkiem i zmierzamy wprost do skarbca Wezyra. Słyszałam o tym tyranie i lękam się tego, co mnie czeka.

Gdy wóz pnie się z mozołem wzdłuż górskiej ścieżki, podejmuję decyzję. Nie trafię w ręce Wezyra. Nie stanę się jego trofeum. Wyswobadzam się z więzów i z bezwiednym zgoła wdziękiem daję się porwać rytmowi. Wóz chwieje się, a strażnicy podnoszą larum. Koła odrywają się od ziemi, konie rżą z lękiem...

Leżę pośród ciał i fragmentów wraku. Moje ramię jest przygwożdżone. Spomiędzy skał wyłania się naraz wąż, smakując powietrze swym rozdwojonym językiem. Jego kły spadają na mnie niczym uderzenie gromu. Jad toczy niespiesznie me ciało. Ścina żyły mrozem i pnie się w górę ramienia, popychając mnie na ścieżkę, z której nie ma odwrotu.

Ostrze jest tępe, a ja mam mało czasu. W spazmach trwogi siekam, rzezam, dźgam. Moje wrzaski niosą się echem po obojętnych wydmach. Cichną w chłodzie pustynnego wiatru. Giną w niemym blasku księżyca. Poświęcam swe piękno na ołtarzu przetrwania. Opłacam swą przyszłość jedyną monetą, która kiedykolwiek była prawdziwie moja.

Spoglądam na mą oderżniętą dłoń. Patrzę na pniak mego skrwawionego ramienia. Nie będzie już pożądliwych spojrzeń tłumu, ni monet rzucanych u mych stóp. Bezgłośnie wypowiadam słowa podziękowania dla mego wybawcy, gdy ten znika pośród cieni. Wreszcie opuściłam mą złotą klatkę. I naraz rozumiem: droga do prawdziwego piękna prowadzi poprzez upadek.

(The journal entry is written in a very fine and elegant cursive) To whomever may be the reader. This is a private journal. Please refrain from reading any further and return this item to its rightful owner. You may find me using the map provided. Thank you. Signed, Euryale (Attached is a detailed map of the Hamlet. However, the directions given have been smudged and are unreadable)

(The journal entry is written in a very fine and elegant cursive) It's been quite some time since I've stepped foot in this grand city. Much has changed in my absence. The miserly workers had been replaced with cheerful men and women talking of the most recent battles in the king's arena. They also talk of a valiant champion who will be fighting in the arena later in the day. I tried to brush off the chatter but as I wandered about, all I heard was more and more of this man's heroic feats. With my interest peaked, I'll be making my way to the gladiatorial ring soon.

(The journal entry is written in a very fine and elegant cursive) Typical. I took a wrong turn on my way to the arena and ended up in a rather droll part of the city which served as a home to many vulgar and unscrupulous individuals. It was only predictable that I would be stopped by a group of these thugs looking to strip me of my belongings. A rather poor choice of words and hands that touched places they shouldn't have resulted in an unpleasant series of events that took up more of my time than I had hoped. The praised hero would begin his fight soon so I hastily picked up my mirror and made my way to the coliseum.

(The journal entry is written in a very fine and elegant cursive) I just barely made it in time for the battle. Luckily one of the guards was kind enough to procure me a seat where I could best spectate the skirmish. As the gates opened, a single man emerged and I sat amongst the crowd in awe.

(The journal entry is written in a very fine and elegant cursive) The audience cheered in excitement. The warrior was the physical embodiment of perfection. His chiseled body told of a man who had seen rigorous battles while his long flowing hair would have many believe he was born from the gods.
